mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer, category_idx) values(#{title},#{content}, #{writer}, #{categoryIdx})
mapper.update: update board set title =#{title}, content =#{content} where board_idx = #{boardIdx};
mapper.select: select board_idx, category_idx, title, content, writer, reg_date, view_cnt, reply_cnt from board where board_idx > 0 order by board_idx desc, reg_date desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(board_idx) from board where board_idx > 0
